content:
ben ErwinSeptember  

Carl Estabrook told a group of about  students and faculty that Americas government has not had a dumber group in Washington than Rumsfeld Rice Cheney and Bush referring to defense secretary Donald national security adviser Condoleezza vice president Dick and president George PERIOD



Estabrook Green Party candidate for Illinois fifteenth Congressional District and history professor at the University of Illinois at ChampaignUrbana spoke to a lively crowd in Room  of the Life Sciences Building PERIOD

Estabrook discussed the inadequacy of Democratic and Republican politicians PERIOD His reasons for running for Congress dealt mainly with the similarities of the two parties PERIOD

Republicans and Democrats are essentially small divisions of the same party PERIOD The Republicans and Democrats have a lock on the political system and they agree on most issues said Estabrook PERIOD

Estabrook said the door is not open to third parties in Illinois and Illinois is the second most difficult state to get a third party candidate on the ballot PERIOD

Estabrook had to get  signatures on a notarized sheet in order to get on the ballot and wound up collecting  PERIOD

Timothy Johnson is the Republican incumbent Estabrook is running against PERIOD Estabrook said unlike Johnsons his campaign is based on issues not money PERIOD

Johnson used the better part of  million to win his last election Estabrook said PERIOD

Estabrook also said he is against the war on terrorism PERIOD

One of the Green Partys principles is nonviolence Estabrook said PERIOD These clowns in Washington are planning to kill Arabs come hell or high water. finally Estabrook discussed voting issues PERIOD

He said only onethird of the public votes in elections PERIOD Estabrook plans to get his votes from the twothirds of the public who does not vote PERIOD

If I obtain only onequarter of the twothirds of the people who normally do not vote I will win in a landslide Estabrook said PERIOD
